name: Ever Loved
headline: Helping families plan and pay for funerals.
description: Ever Loved is a one-stop-shop to help families plan better funerals with less stress. Ever Loved makes it easy to come up with the funds needed ($9,000 on average), find the best vendors and products, and communicate with the community of the deceased to bring people together, both online and offline.

# Celebrate anamazing life
  * Easily share information with friends and family
  * Raise money in someone's memory
  * Find great funeral providers and products


[ Get started ](https://everloved.com/</memorial/create/?flow=101>)
Learn more ![](https://everloved.com/static/svg/caret-down.18f351e71b18.svg)
##  Focus on family and community, not logistics and costs. 
Ever Loved helps you take care of everything in one place. Easily find the best providers, share the details that matter and raise the funds that you need. 
[ Get started ](https://everloved.com/</memorial/create/?flow=101>)
##  Celebrate your loved one with a beautiful, community-oriented memorial website 
Easily share an obituary and funeral events. Plus, collect photos, stories and memorial donations from friends and family. 
[ Create a memorial website ](https://everloved.com/</memorial/create/?flow=101>) [ See an example ](https://everloved.com/</life-of/memorial-website-example/?flow=101>)
![](https://everloved.com/static/svg/product-landing-pages/story-icon.5225a8923554.svg)
### Publish an obituary
Publish a free online obituary that anyone can view. Easily collect photos and stories from others, all in one place. 
![](https://everloved.com/static/svg/product-landing-pages/calendar-icon.d9413c2d92fd.svg)
### Share events
Easily get the word out about funeral events in just a few clicks, and collect RSVPs, so you don't need to worry about surprises. 
![](https://everloved.com/static/svg/memories.7b890f167b45.svg)
### Get financial support
Set up an optional fundraiser, so friends and family can chip in to help with funeral costs. You're not in this alone. 
## Make sure everythinggets taken care of
  * Learn about over 50 post-death tasks
  * Assign tasks to yourself and others
  * Get instructions and tips for each
  * Track what has been done


[ View the checklist ![arrow pointing right](https://everloved.com/static/svg/right-arrow-white.3e70bd459842.svg) ](https://everloved.com/</after-death-checklist/>)
##  Save thousands of dollars on caskets, urns, headstones and more 
We've brought together some of the best independent memorial companies to help you find exactly what you're looking for at the best possible price. 
[ Browse funeral products ](https://everloved.com/</funeral-products/?flow=101>)
##  Find guidance, support, inspiration and understanding. 
We have resources to help you through every stage of funeral planning, memorializing and grieving. 
Read first
[ How to Plan a Funeral Planning a funeral can feel incredibly daunting. There are options to weigh, people to take into account and laws to follow -- and all of this gets more difficult when you’re experiencing grief. Here is a step-by-step guide to help simplify the funeral planning process and make sure you’re aware of ](https://everloved.com/</articles/funeral-planning/how-to-plan-a-funeral/>)
Read next
[ What to Do When Someone Dies: A Checklist Losing someone close to you can be incredibly difficult, and if you’re responsible for handling funeral arrangements and personal affairs, the experience is often overwhelming. If this applies to you, here’s a death notification checklist of things that need to be taken care of after someone passes  ](https://everloved.com/</articles/end-of-life-affairs/what-to-do-when-someone-dies-checklist/>) [ How Much Do Funerals Cost? It’s easy for funeral costs to add additional stressors to the already stressful experience of losing a loved one. Whether you’re planning for the future or have recently lost someone, understanding your options and what the  ](https://everloved.com/</articles/funeral-planning/how-much-do-funerals-cost/>) [ 8 Ways to Save Money on a Funeral The average funeral costs about $9,000, which can be an enormous burden on a family that’s just lost a loved one. However, if you’re looking for a more affordable funeral option, there are lots of ways ](https://everloved.com/</articles/funeral-planning/ways-to-save-money-on-funeral/>) [ Top Free Obituary Templates Writing an obituary can be hard, but you don’t need to go without help. That’s why we’ve put together a collection of free obituary templates, obituary examples and obituary samples to help you write an amazing obituary for your loved one. Each one is an easy-to-follow, fill-in-the-blank obituary te ](https://everloved.com/</articles/obituaries-and-funeral-announcements/top-free-obituary-templates/>)
Plus, learn about [funeral etiquette](https://everloved.com/</articles/funeral-etiquette/>), [funeral customs](https://everloved.com/</articles/funeral-customs/>), [funeral songs](https://everloved.com/</articles/funeral-songs/>), and more.
[ READ MORE ARTICLES ![](https://everloved.com/static/svg/right-arrow-white.3e70bd459842.svg) ](https://everloved.com/</articles/>)
## Looking for an obituary or memorial website?
Search by first and last name to find an online memorial.

generated_description:
**Ever Loved: Simplifying Funeral Planning**

Ever Loved is a startup that aims to ease the process of funeral planning for families during one of their most difficult times. Founded in 2017 and based in San Francisco, it emerged from the Y Combinator S19 batch. The mission is straightforward: help families plan and fund funerals with less stress.

On average, funeral costs hover around $9,000, which can be an overwhelming burden. Ever Loved not only helps users raise these funds through community support but also streamlines the process of finding reliable vendors and products—all in one place. They provide essential tools for planning funerals and creating memorials, helping to connect family and friends online and offline.

Ever Loved’s offerings include:

- **Funeral Planning**: A user-friendly interface to manage funeral arrangements.
- **Memorial Websites**: A platform where families can create beautiful, personalized memorial sites to honor their loved ones.
- **Vendor Listings**: Access to funeral homes, cemeteries, and hospice services to find the best options.
- **Financial Assistance**: Features that allow families to set up fundraisers for funeral expenses.
- **Guidance and Resources**: A wealth of articles and checklists to navigate the complexities of post-death tasks.

The team, which comprises just five individuals, focuses on supporting families by providing a comprehensive toolkit that allows them to focus on remembrance rather than logistics. Their approach encourages community involvement, facilitating shared memories and support during grief.

If you’re looking for experienced guidance in navigating funeral planning, or if you need to create an online space to commemorate someone special, check out Ever Loved at [everloved.com](https://everloved.com). They’re here to ensure you’re not alone in this journey, making it as easy and meaningful as possible.
